biography: Rasmus, a name well-known at Vihti Golf Club, is recognized for his strategic approach to the game. Though seemingly reserved, those who know Rasmus understand his dry wit and fierce competitive spirit on the course.
Rasmus has made one appearance at the Hector Trophée. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him, Rasmus's dedication to the sport remains unquestionable.

Currently considered retired from the Hector Trophée, fans will be disappointed not to see him at the Hector Trophée 2025. However, golf enthusiasts remain hopeful for a potential return to the competition in the future.
